data.title: Once Upon A Con – Fall Into Fantasy
data.meta_description:
Fall Into Fantasy  Get Your Tickets     

Fall Into Fantasy  Get Your Tickets    

August 14-17, 2025 - Gaylord National Harbor, MD 
Join us for the nation’s first fantasy book convention located in Gaylord National Harbor, MD. Immerse yourself in your favorite bookish worlds with
data.text: Join us for the nation’s first fantasy book convention located in Gaylord National Harbor, MD. Immerse yourself in your favorite bookish worlds with over 100 vendors and guest authors, exciting panels and workshops, TTRPG room, plus our own Starfall Masquerade and High Fantasy Fashion Show. Dress to impress for the first book-centered cosplay competition, make new friends with over a dozen cosplay fandom meetups, and so much more!
